definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: straitness, straits, stress;—alw. abs. ´[[מ]];—´[[כָּל־אִישׁ מ]] 1Sa 22:2 every man of straits (in straits); ´[[בְּמָחוֹר וּבְמ]] De 28:53, De 28:55, De 28:57, Je 19:9 (all of national straits); [[מְחָאוּנִי]] ´[[חַר־וּמ]] Ps 119:143; perh. rd. [[מָחוֹק]] also Ps 32:6, for [[מחא רק]], cf. Du Br.
